thi-ap35:4.2: hitāya janataṁ bahuṁ → janatāya hitaṁ bahuṁ (bj); hitāya janataṁ sadā (sya1ed, sya2ed); hitāya janasaṁsariṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap35:11.3: Uppajji lokasaraṇo → vadataṁ varo (sya1ed, sya2ed); ca dīpavaro (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap35:11.4: araṇo amataṅgato → sabbasattānamuttamo (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
